long_description: Potholes, curbs and traffic lights just fade to the background when you're cranking through city streets on the capable Marin Muirwoods 29er bike, which features fast-rolling 29 in. wheels. Mountain bike-geometry offers a heads-up ride and nimble, easy handling though urban terrain, and 29 in. wheels roll quickly and easily over uneven city streets. Double-butted chromoly frame offers sturdy handling whether jumping curbs or braking quickly. Transfer your pedaling power efficiently through the Truvativ 48/38/28 crankset and 11-32, 8-speed cassette. Shimano shifters and derailleurs provide snappy shifts through the 24 gear combinations. Tektro hydraulic disc brakes provide powerful, controlled deceleration. Wheelset features durable rims and smooth-rolling, double-sealed hubs; puncture-resistant Schwalbe Citizen tires deter flats. WTB Vigo Comp saddle is ergonomically designed to minimize riding discomfort and numbness. Frame also features eyelets for both fenders and a rack (not included). Marin Muirwoods 29er bike specs are subject to change.
short_description: Potholes, curbs and traffic lights just fade to the background when you're cranking through city streets on the capable Marin Muirwoods 29er bike, which features fast-rolling 29 in. wheels.
